name: symmetrical recollection
description:
• Mouse to move and Left-Click to harvest/interact
  • Click the left and right arrows on the screen to navigate the scene
  • Collect resources and exchange them to improve and maintain the environment

Big thanks to all the mentors of this jam who gave guidance all throughout!

Credit to mackysoft's Unity-SerializeReferenceExtension plugin to make some of the data management much easier. Otherwise, art assets and the majority of code created by me.
